# General Dependencies for Booking Bot
# Configuration and environment
pyyaml>=6.0
python-dotenv>=0.19.0

# Development and testing
pytest>=7.0.0
pytest-cov>=4.0.0

# Logging and utilities
colorama>=0.4.4

# Note: For logistic regression components, install: pip install -r requirements-logistic-regression.txt
# Note: For GPT-2 components, install: pip install -r requirements-gpt2.txt
